EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Business Aviation Newsletter - May 2018 Edition
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> BUSINESS AVIATION NEWSLETTER May 2018 DON'T LET THIS COME BETWEEN YOU AND NEXT WINTER'S VACATION Honeywell's SmartView® Synthetic Vision System provides 3-D color images of runways, terrain, and obstacles, giving pilots an increased level of situational awareness when approaching terrain-constrained airports in instrument meteorological conditions...
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/SmartViewSV.html]]> Field service pro stands behind every Honeywell engine Ryan Goldstein is often the first point of contact for customers with propulsion engine or auxiliary power unit questions or issues...
Read more. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2018_05_CPS_LandingPage_Goldstein_RW_2018_05_CPS_LandingPage_Goldstein.html]]> One runway, steep approach, strong and variable winds, and buildings make for a white-knuckle approach. Choose SmartRunway® and SmartLanding® for confident approaches in all conditions, without the white knuckles....
Learn more. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/SmartRunwayLanding.html]]> Upgrade To FMS Version 6.1 Operators are encouraged to upgrade their FMS subscription before their next database renewal cycle.... Read more. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/FMSNotice_2017.html?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiT1RabU1qZGpaREE0WlRCbSIsInQiOiJtb1FwaUtwaXd5SkpkUnZJNmVVWGZ4bnVQaVM0dUYwdkIzVWJjTFdDS2xSVUFoMDZaM1dBY3pjcWhhQzBVYTZXY3VaZmxxd3NaUzR6N1JcL3ZMdGJNMlE9PSJ9]]> MyAerospace Portal makes it easy to connect with Honeywell Honeywell’s MyAerospace Portal provides immediate access to your parts and repair information and a wide range of services, support and technical information... Take me to MyAerospace Portal now! <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
